title: Afterlife
description: In Paradise everything is perfect. Eve is reunited with her dead sister. They drink tea. Where Mare has ended up seems less idyllic as it sinks into an icy ocean. Then there’s Peter. He opens his eyes running across a broken landscape, under a terrible red sky. But not everything is as it seems. As Mare runs and Peter fights for survival, Eve discovers that Paradise also hides a chilling secret.A group of teens, from a sinister version of future Britain, are scattered across the Afterlife. Can they figure it out before it’s too late?You can download Afterlife for free and pay what you like after reading! Visit afterlifethenovel to find out more #Bookbusking
author: H Comerford
